publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1955 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designations of Lead Committee—That the Parliament agrees the following designations of Lead Committee— The Justice 1 Committee to consider the European Communities (Service of Judicial and Extrajudicial Documents) (Scotland) Regulations 2001, (SSI 2001/172), and The Justice 2 Committee to consider the Sex Offenders (Notification Requirements) (Prescribed Police Stations) (Scotland) Regulations 2001, (SSI 2001/173). Supported by: Euan Robson*
